g.yas su ma yin/ shar du ma yin/ lho ru ma yin/ nub tu ma yin/ byang du ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og tu ma yin/ phyogs mtshams su'ang ma lta bar song shig /rigs kyi bu/ ji
ltar bdag las ma g.yos shing 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin pa dang / ji ltar gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ji
ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig /gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni/ rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni/ 'khor ba la spyod do/ /gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob bo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par gyur to/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni/ sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par
'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so/ /legs
so| |zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
pa med par chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang ba dang / dngos po yongs su spang ba dang / sems
can du lta ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par bya/ gus par bya/ bsnyen
bkur bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa'am/ dge slong chos
smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas
pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'di bdag gis thos pas myur du
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par
'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dal ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par
'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi
zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi
bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra
dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste/ de dag chos smra ba des zil gyis mnan nas thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing
bsten par byed pa dang / bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o/ /gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/
bdag ni/ thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni/ thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so/ /'di ni/ sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ gang la'ang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyi/ skad
cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/
gso ba med pa/ skyes bu med pa/ gang zag med/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis chos thams
cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na/ ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan
yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la som shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/
de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi
bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ /zhes de skad kyang thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la
ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so/ /snyam du bsams nas de sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing
cho nges 'debs te/ mya ngan byed la smre zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar bya'o/ /nyin mtshan gnyis
sam| gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi
skyed| rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/
grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do/ /snyam du bsams so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal
ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang
yang ma byung ngo / /rab 'byor/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas
legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so/ /legs so/ /ji ltar khyed kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu/
sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di nyid dang / spro ba 'di nyid dang / don du gnyer ba 'di nyid dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyis rjes

su 'brang zhing shar /phyogs nyid du song zhig dang / rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun
gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ mchur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas
pa| bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa/ phigs par gyur pa/ mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye
bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa/ grong khyer gyi de'i khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po
che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/
mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa
thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi thag gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'brel ba/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i grong khyer de gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol
mo sna tshogs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na/
sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa'i chus

yongs su gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang / ba ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do/ /chu de dag nyid la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun
rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /chu de dag thams cad kyang ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri bzang po'i ngang dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi
rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag thams
cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag khebs shing / ut+pa
la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang mchu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam ste/ dri bzang ba/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por ston pa/ sngon por snang
ba| ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por ston pa/ ser por snang ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar por ston pa/ dmar por snang ba/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por
ston pa| dkar por snang ba dag yod do/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / kA raN+Da dang / sA ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de dag thams
cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ 'di ltar yun ring por sems can de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul la gus par byed
pa rjes su 'gro ba'i thos pa dang sems pa legs par rtogs pa/ yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no/ /de la
rigs kyi bu/ grong khyer spos dang ldan pa de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag
tshad kyi tshad tsam/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ rab rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyad pa

dang / nye bar longs spyad pa dang / yongs su longs spyod pa dag tu rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna
tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang 'di lta ste/ rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga'
ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ de'ang rdzing bu de
dag gi ngos gcig ni/ gser gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gnyis pa ni/ dngul gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gsum pa ni/ bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin/ ngos bzhi pa ni/
shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'og gi sa gzhi ni/ ka ra ke ta na'i rang bzhin la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them skas them pa rin po che'i rang bzhin sna tshogs
pa rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so/ /rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni/
me tog ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / kA raN+Da dang / sA ra sa rnams skad 'byin to/ /rdzing bu de dag gi khor
yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ me tog gi shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan+dan
gyi drir phyogs shing / kha dog dang ldan/ dri dang ldan/ ro dang ldan/ reg dang ldan no/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug
khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing dbang du gyur pa ste/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang / bud med gang
gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur te rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ /
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de dus de srid du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ston to/ /sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri
gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan bar tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi
ka'i gos bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la'ang gos kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sam snyam pa/ legs
par gnas pa sna tshogs pa rnam par smin pas lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu 'dzin par byed cing / sa phyogs de khor yug tu'ang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor/ rab tu
gter| yang dag par gtor bar byed la/ ji ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos la gus pas sa
phyogs de'ang dri dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can de dag ni/ de ltar chos la gus par byed cing chos rnams la brten pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pas dad pa dang dang ba
bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ /de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang
po| |srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni/ lung 'bogs/ la la ni/ kha ton byed/ la la ni/ yi ger 'dri/ la la ni/
tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
ston pa| yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de
bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par bskyed pas song zhing dang / ring por mi thogs par shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs/ rab tu mgu zhing dga'
ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag zug rngu 'di las sgrol zhing bdag sdug
bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe gang bdag
la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa
ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi

sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par
mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me
long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang yig

'bru sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyis tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med

pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos

kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge mngon par sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams
cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par

'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos

thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud
kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa dag
mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa

spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na'ang gang 'dir khyod kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag

thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to/ /nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang
bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba'am/ ldang bar bya ba'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad par bya ba'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ chos gang
gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na
med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung
ba'am| mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bas na/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dod pas
gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ don du gnyer ba dang / 'dod pa la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod
kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o/ /phangs par bya'o/ /rab tu dang bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhes kyang gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to/ /de dag gis de la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod yun ring po nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
thabs mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bslabs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa tshor
bas des bsgo ba dang / des byas pa bzhin du zungs shig /rigs kyi bu/ gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa
gnyis sam/ bskal pa gsum mam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de bas lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing / bde ba'i yo byad thams
cad kyis rim gror byas te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang / rigs kyi bu/
khyod rigs kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la lan lon pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
rnams rnyed par gyur to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di snyam du
sems so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar
gyur to| |yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni/ gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba
rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyi/ bdag byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces
don 'di nyid dri'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus
par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/
bdag ni/ dbul te/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos sam/ rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig
gam| bai DUr+ya'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ dri'am/ phreng ba'am/ byug pa'am/ phye ma'am/ chos gos sam/ gdugs sam
rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu'am/ ba dan de lta bu'ang bdag la ci yang med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis mi
rigs pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am/ rangs pa yang mi skye'o/ /snyam du bsams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla
ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu grong bar gyi srang ga la
ba der song ste/ de'i grong bar gyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di snyam du/ 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o/ /yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de 'gags par btsongs so/ /'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis
yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang / 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /snyam
du bsams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar gyi tshong dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste mi su 'dod/ mi su 'dod/ mi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra bsgrags
shing skad kyis bos so/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir byed cing / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ myur du bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ des thos pa rgya mtsho
rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed
par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dang / gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar
chad bya'o/ /snyam du bsams so/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su 'dod/ mi su 'dod/ mi
su nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ji ltar mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsgribs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/
phyogs gcig tu song nas ngus te mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad du/ bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba'ang
bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni/ thob pa ngan pa thob bo/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
tu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o/ /snyam du bsams so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar khyod yid mi dga' zhing gdung

la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes/ de la rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ nga'i lus btsong bar 'dod na/ lus 'di nyo ba yang ma rnyed do/ /brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs
can gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu ngus de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ nga ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod par
bya bar 'dod cing / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas de la nga 'di snyam du sems so/ /kye ma nga
ni| bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur
sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga la mis

ni| bya ba med kyi/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag nga la dgos na/ de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa'i
mchog legs par rnyed do/ /bdag gi lus ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas de sems dga'
ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang dang / gang 'dod pa sbyin no/ /des de
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin
cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so/ /brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog

tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang / brla sha med par
btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha
byed pa| bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag
tu ngus de la smras pa/ bu mo/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags la'ang bkur stir bya'o/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di ltar bdag gi
snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam/ yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des
bu mo de la 'di skad ces/ bu mo/ rigs kyi bu de ni/ gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs na/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu
chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen
po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang rab tu
thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes
rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur| gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po phul du byung ba 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi don
'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su gtang bar bya ba yin na/ mang po'i phyir lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag
rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongs su brjod pa ji lta bar bdag kyang 'dod cing bzod do/ /de lta na'ang rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang dang gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
la bkur stir bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya'am/ dngul lam/ mu sa la gar+b+ha'am/ lo hi tA rA ga'am/ shel lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ dri'am/ phreng
ba'am| byug pa'am/ phye ma'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu'am/ ba dan nam/ mar me khyod la ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la sbyin gyi/ bdag nyid la 'di
lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la/ bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig

tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas
nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos
don du gnyer ba 'di ni/ legs so/ legs so/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che shin tu thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rigs

kyi bu| nga la snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis mchog slongs shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la mchog ci lta bu
zhig sbyin par bya zhes smras so/ /des de la smras pa/ brgya byin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la stsol cig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yul 'di la ni/ nga'i nus pa yod pa
ma yin te/ yul 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ mchog gzhan slongs shig /rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas

'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /lha rnams kyi dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po bden pa gang gis
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing / bdag gi
lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen na/ bden pa de dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang / de nas
skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du
gnas pa dang / nad med pa dang / gnod pa med par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can yang spobs pa med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
so| |rigs kyi bu/ khyod tshur shog /bdag gi khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ngo / /bdag gis pha ma'i drung nas nor blangs te/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya ba khyod la sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang 'grogs nas de'i rang gi khyim gang na yod pa der dong ste phyin nas sgo drung du bsdad do/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas
pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig /bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal pa'i g.yog mo bu mo lnga brgya
'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod
pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces
smras so| |bu mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya ba de su zhig /de da lta gang na 'dug /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da lta 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs
kyi bu| de ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor
ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal/
'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing ma rnyed pas
sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas mchis pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
khyod sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing mchi ma phyung nas gnas pa ci nyes/ des de la smras pa/ bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod na/ bdag gi de nyo ba'ang ma rnyed do/ /
bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o/ /nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ de la rag las pas 'di lta
ste| chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ nga mi 'dod de/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa
der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so/ /zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no/ /zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs
te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs/ brla sha med par btogs te rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /snyam nas rigs
kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do/ /mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la bdag nyid na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/
de'i thad du bdag mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad
ces mchi ste/ bu mo/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni/ dbul te/ nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do/ /zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis
khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o/ /zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te rigs kyi bu/ des khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam/ yon tan gyi khyad par
ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ des bdag la 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di
lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag la mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba
dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di shin tu chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gang rang gi lus kyi bar du'ang mi gnas par spro ba ni/ dka' ba
bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod gang dag mang zhing rgya che ba dag yod na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag chos
la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i
srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi na tsha dag ma byed cig /khyod don gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba'i nor mang po
dag bdag gis pha ma las blangs te bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o/ /bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod
par bgyi'o/ /gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /zhes bgyis na/ yab yum gyis dkor
gyi phung po chen po de bdag la stsal pa gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod
par bgyi'o// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dka'
ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni/ gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par

byed pa'i bar ni/ ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu gang dag de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas dag la spro bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gi/ bu mo/ nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa byed du 'gro yi/ nged 'gro ba'i go skabs phye zhig /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas te rang gi pha ma la rig par byas nas 'di skad ces/ yab yum ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin
du mdzod cig dang / bdag ni/ dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang /
bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas par gyur to/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /rgyan
gyis brgyan nas me tog tha dad pa kha dog sna tshogs pa dag dang / gos kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang /
gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag dang / rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi me tog dag
kyang thogs/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po pha mas kyang thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu lhan cig tu zhugs te bu mo lnga
brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song ba
dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun
gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ mchur dpag tshad bcu
gnyis| zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang pa/ bar gyi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bu blta na
sdug pa| phigs par gyur pa/ mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa

grong khyer de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag
du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas
snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni/ bdag gis

mi cha'o| |snyam nas shing rta las babs so/ /de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang gzhan tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang mnyam du shing rta las babs so/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rin po
che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin las byas pa/ tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te de dag
sgron ma'i bya ba byed do/ /bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis

bdug par byed do/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhi btsugs te de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser
gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong zhing / de na lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha

rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor

mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo / /lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so/ /mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces

smras so/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po/ khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma

dang / lha'i dngul gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par mthor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams
kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su 'gro ba dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa de gang na
bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa 'phags pa byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim pa bdun gyis rgyas btab nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gis me tog dang / phreng ba'i chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug
pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / gser dang / dngul las byas pa'i me tog gang dag thogs te 'ongs pa'i tshogs de
dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa'i phyir de dag las gzhan dang /
gzhan ches so sor bzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dag gis me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang /
phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul las byas pa'i me tog
dang / lha'i rol mo rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi
phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul las byas pa'i me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /lha'i sil snyan dag kyang yang
dag par rab tu dkrol lo/ /de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to/ /gser dang dngul las
byas pa'i me tog dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog de dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de'i chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna
tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong ste/ mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid na'ang rdzu
'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /ji ltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa
dang / bla mar byed par shog cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar yang dag par ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa
bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bo rnams kyis mngon du phyag 'tshal nas zhe sa byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di na bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na/ rigs
kyi bu| shar phyogs su song zhig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgra thos te/ bdag gis sgra de las yang dag par bstan pa de thos nas shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su

mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid gcig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su'i drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba yang dag par 'gro ba sgra thos pa la bdag
gis ma dris so/ /snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas
la sems pa ni/ ma byung gi/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ji srid gcig tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed
par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so/ /snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig byung ste de 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rim gyis song
dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs te/ de nas
bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po de nyid kyis khyab par gyur nas sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod kyis
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so/ /de bdag gis thos pa na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to/ /bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ legs so/ /khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan/
yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas mi snang bar gyur to/ bdag kyang de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo/ /de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos

'phags ni/ gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu
bslabs pa yin te/ des bdag la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa'i don 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsams
te| bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sgra thos pa las ji ltar gdams pa de ltar shar phyogs ga la ba der mchis te/ mchis nas kyang rgyang ring mo zhig nas bdag gis 'phags pa chos ston
pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa rtse gcig par yid la byed pa'i bde ba de lta bu skyes par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod la bdag
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces 'dri na/ rigs kyi bu/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ 'phags
pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu pa'o// //de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud
cing / de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ stong pa
nyid la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta ba bzhin la ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ ji lta ba bzhin
gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ 'gog pa la ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i khams la ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba
shes pa med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na med de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos 'di dag gi de
bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di dag ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de
bzhin nyid la ni/ gnyis su byar med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/

dper na/ skyes bus sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la sos ka'i tsha ba nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba la 'dir chu btung ngo / /snyam nas de gang du chu mthong ba de dang der rgyug na/ rigs
kyi bu| de ji snyam du sems/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'am/ lho phyogs sam/ nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs las chu de gang nas 'ongs/ chu de gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu/ skyes bu de nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab
'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyes kyi/ yang de la chu ni/ rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam sgrar mngon par chags pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud
par rtog go/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dper na/ skyes
bu de nyid chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos nyid kyi sku'o/ /rigs
kyi bu| chos nyid ni/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas
sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
la yang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/
lnga'am| drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ dgu'am/ bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ brgya'am/ stong ngam/ brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong
ba las sad pa dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du
bzhud| rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rmi lam la chos gang yang yongs su grub par shes pa mi gda'o/ /rmi lam ni/ rdzun te/ yang dag pa ma lags so/ /chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rmi lam lta bu'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa
la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug po 'di dag thams cad du
dong ba 'dong ba 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las
rgyang ring du gyur pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang gang dag chos thams cad ni/ rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa
shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go /gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de
dag ni| de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes so/ /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par mi
rtog go /gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar spyod pa ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ba ste/ de dang de dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho nas ma yin/ nub nas ma yin/ byang nas ma yin/ phyogs mtshams nas ma yin/ steng dang 'og
nas ma yin/ phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par
'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas 'byung ngo / /rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ 'on kyang rkyen
de dag yod na/ rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do/ /rkyen de dag med na/ rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku yongs su
grub pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi
spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin zhing / de ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
na'ang yod pa ma yin no/ /'on kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na/ sku mngon par grub pa'ang mi snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/

pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro /gang na'ang mi 'pho ste/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la brten nas byung ba/ rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/
'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ yu ba la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol
ba la brten nas 'di ltar pi wang de las sgra byung ste/ rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa'i sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / yu ba
las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar gdags so/ /sgra
de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med

pa yang ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/ de ni/ gang nas kyang ma byon to/ /rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa de ltar blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ khyod gang tshun
chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe sa g.yo ba chen po
byung ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ltas chen po bco brgyad dang / rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos
rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/
'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel
ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to/ /dus ma yin pa'i me tog

dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing me tog gi char chen po dag kyang bab bo/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dag gi phyogs su lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/
mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang sems can gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i sa la
gnas pa/ lta ba dang bcas pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam bstan pa thos so/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang
lags| rkyen gang lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon/ mi bzhud pa bstan pa 'di khyod
kyis dris te bdag gis bstan pas srog chags stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gang bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa'i
bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa mchog tu legs par rnyed do/ /'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub yongs su 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdag slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go /bdag ni/ the tshom med par de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun
tsam na 'dug ste/ 'di ltar bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o/ /snyam du sems so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong ste de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dag byin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi
bu| khyod kyis lha'i me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pas bkur stir gyis shig /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba
yin te| rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi mthus deng srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar
byed pa de ltar bskal pa gzhal du med grangs med par spro bar byed cing / khur chen po khyer bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung nas me tog man+dA ra ba de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par
gtor| mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ deng slan
chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo/ /zhes smras te/ des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag
cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyi/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
chub sems dpa' rnams bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo dag /gal te khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig

dang de ltar na bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo / /bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go /khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci dang ci 'dod par bya bar

bdag nyid 'bul lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas
thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la rim gro dang / zham 'bring bya ba'i phyir phul te/ rigs kyi bu/ bdag ni/ g.yog mo 'di dag 'bul zhing shing rta lnga brgya
'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ legs so/ /
rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'byor pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de ltar na/ chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te/ rigs kyi bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems

dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i tshul dang / 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya po de
dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la slar byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par
gyur te| 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa'am nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di ni/ ma legs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags bdag gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o/ /zhes sems par gyur to/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag gzhal du
med grangs med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar
du gnyid dang / rmugs pa med par spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma
byung / ro la brkam pa ma yin/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma byung ste/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag
cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri bshams nas bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag
ma btab kyi/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston pa 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya/
me tog sna tshogs mngon par dgram mo/ snyam mo/ /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i
rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra dag las
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags da ste zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
thos so| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te tshong dpon gyi bu
mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de phyogs nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin bshams so/ /de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos lus las phud de
bla gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo / /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yid rangs/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi
dga' zhing sdug bsngal te yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis

sa phyogs der chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de thams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas pas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du/ ma la bdag
gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni/ rdul che ste/ sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung gi /bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni/ bla'i/ nus
ba med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor zhing bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni/ 'di lta bu'i gnas sam/ chos
